  • Uses of Location in game.tree

    Methods in game.tree with parameters of type Location
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Mature.tick​(Location location)
    Method called tick that helps keep track of turns and gets location Adds a koopa at a 15% chance; sets a new sprout at a random fertile exit every 5 turns; becomes dirt at a 20% chance
    void Sapling.tick​(Location location)
    Method called tick that helps keep track of turns and gets location Adds a new coin at a 10% chance and becomes a Mature tree if turn is 10
    void Sprout.tick​(Location location)
    Method called tick that helps keep track of turns and gets location Adds goomba at a 10% chance and becomes a sapling if turn is 10
    void Tree.tick​(Location location)
    method that takes in location and keeps track of turn
